name: Spider-Man: Edge of Time
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Fight Today, Save Tomorrow.



Play as both Amazing Spider-Man and Spider-Man 2099 in SPIDER-MAN: EDGE OF TIME, a high-octane, adrenaline-fueled adventure that puts gamers on a mission to prevent a cataclysmic event that leads to an unexpected outcome: the death of Amazing Spider-Man.

Features

- Rich, tightly crafted narrative written by acclaimed Marvel writer Peter David- Epic mission to save Spider-Man and the world from a chaotic, dystopian future in a thrilling race against time- Two timelines evolve in parallel with story-driven cause and effect moments where the actions of one Spider-Man have an immediate effect on the world of the other Spider-Man- Featuring an all-star voice cast that includes Val Kilmer, Laura Vandervoort, Katee Sackhoff and more!
